participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is an adventurous spirit who loves learning and sharing knowledge. She is nurturing and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Marcus is disciplined and caring, with a strong sense of duty. He has a soft spot for animals and enjoys giving back to the community.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
